/usr/bin/c++   -g -Wall -std=c++11    CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/TerrainBorder.cpp.o CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/Engine.cpp.o CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/Camera.cpp.o CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/Cube.cpp.o CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/ShaderProgram.cpp.o CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/DefualtProgram.cpp.o CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/Terrain.cpp.o CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/BorderUpdateProgram.cpp.o CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/ShowMapFBO.cpp.o CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/Input.cpp.o CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/Entity.cpp.o CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/Texture.cpp.o CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/TerrainProgram.cpp.o CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/ShadowMapProgram.cpp.o CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/Graphics.cpp.o CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/EntityManager.cpp.o CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/Clock.cpp.o CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/BorderRenderProgram.cpp.o  -o engine -rdynamic -lSDL2 -lGLEW -lGLU -lGL -lgdal -lfreeimageplus
